translations.translation: We bore him on a planked and well-caulked ship,
But We bore him on a (vessel made) of planks and oakum,
And We bore Noah on the vessel built of planks and nails,
We carried him, (Noah), on a vessel built with boards fixed together with nails,
And We carried Nooh upon a ship of wooden planks and nails.
And We carried him on a (ship) made of planks and nails (Dusur)
And We bore him on that which was made of planks and nails
And We bore him upon a well-planked vessel well-caulked
And We carried him upon a thing of planks and nails,
We bore him on an [ark] which, made of planks and nails,
And We bare him on a thing of planks and nails.
We bore him on a vessel made of planks and nails,
But We bore him on an (Ark) made of broad planks and caulked with palm-fibre:
And We carried him on a (ship) made of planks and nails,
We carried him in a well built, watertight vessel made from planks (of wood)
And We carried him on a craft of planks and nails.
And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

[54:13] And We bore him, that is, Noah, on one, a ship, [made] of planks and nails (dusur is what boards are fastened down with of nails and the like; the singular is disār, similar [in pattern] to [kutub] kitāb, ‘book’),
(And We carried him) i.e. Noah and those who believed in him (upon a thing of planks and nails) an ark,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ } فذاتُ الأَلواحِ يُريدُ السّفينةَ
 وأَلواحُها: عَوارضُها
 والدُّسرُ: المَساميرُ
 واحدُها دِسارُ
 ويقال: دُسرُ: معناه تَدسُرُ السَّفينةُ المَاءَ بصدرِها معناه تَدفَعهُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما طغى الماء، وطاف حول الأرض { حَمَلْنَاهُ } أي: نوحاً ومن تبعه { عَلَىٰ } سفينة { ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ } أخشاب عراض { وَدُسُرٍ } [القمر: 13] مسامير طوال { تَجْرِي } السفينة { بِأَعْيُنِنَا } وكنف حفظنا وحضانتنا

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وحملناه على ذات ألواح } أي: أخشاب عريضة، والمراد: السفينة، وهي من الصفات التي تقوم مقام موصوفها كالشرح له، وهو من فصيح الكلام ومن بديعه، { ودُسُرٍ } ومسامير، جمع: دسار، وهو المسمار، فِعال مِن: دسره: إذا دفعه لأنه يدسَر به مَنفذه
